headline: Tariffs push small and midsize toy companies into survival mode
summary: Kerry Addis and her father, Dana Silva, were in China visiting factories in April when they woke up to the news that threatened to devastate their family board game business: President Donald Trump announced that new tariffs on Chinese imports would hit 145 percent. The panic set in over breakfast: “What just happened?” Kerry, the chief operating officer of WS Game Co., recalled asking Dana, who oversees manufacturing. “How do we move forward?”Subscribe to The Post Most newsletter for the most i

headline: Is Costco Still a Good Bet After Recent Earnings Growth Slows in 2025?
summary: If you are standing on the sidelines, wondering whether to jump into Costco Wholesale, you are not alone. Plenty of investors have watched its stock continue to defy gravity, with a five-year rise of 199.2% and a strong three-year gain of 88.1%. Even if the past year’s return of 7.9% seems a bit subdued compared to Costco’s past performance, it is important to realize that many market watchers are keeping a close eye on shifts in consumer spending and changes in how investors view risk in the...
